entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Amount 5 cm in snow squalls. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 30 January 2023
